name: Carmine A. LAURO, Sr. Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Lauro v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Carmine A. LAURO, Sr. Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of December, it is hereby ordered that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
